valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 28 Oct 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 29 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low just west of Rockall 986 expected Malin 988 by midday tomorrow. Lows Cromarty 991 and FitzRoy 1006 losing their identities
